text:
All visitation to hospital wards will be stopped from 5 - 18 August 2021 (both dates inclusive), except for the patient groups below, who will be allowed visitation on a conditional and case-by-case basis, as assessed by the hospital:
a. Patients whose conditions have turned very ill;
b. Paediatric patients;
c. Birthing/post-partum mothers; and
d. Patients requiring additional care support from caregivers, e.g. assistance of inpatients who have mental incapacities and family members who are undergoing caregiver training.
See nifty infographic by AH for more details.
